hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Minuet of Forest# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Fire Temple#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that most of the water in Hyrule flows through King Zora's buttocks.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Song of Time#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Front Left Fake Wall Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #a Dodongo's Cavern Compass#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Spirit Temple#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #the Prelude of Light# and #Epona's Song#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Song of Time#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #a Red Potion Bottle# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Spirit Temple#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #an Odd Mushroom# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Map of the Water Temple# and #a Map of the Forest Temple#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Deku Shield# and #a Heart Container#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #3# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #an Ocarina# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #Arrows (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Climb North Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that beating Bongo Bongo quickly requires an even tempo.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #3# major items.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Front Center Bombable Chest

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #an Ice Trap#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.
